$comment: Fixture manifest for PEAC conformance testing. This file contains metadata about fixtures so the fixture files themselves can be pure receipts.

minimal-receipt.json.description: Minimal valid PEAC receipt - only required fields

full-receipt.json.description: Full PEAC receipt with all fields populated

control-chain.json.description: PEAC receipt with multi-step control chain (CAL)

subject-snapshot.json.description: PEAC receipt with subject profile snapshot

missing-iss.json.description: Missing required 'iss' field in auth context

missing-iat.json.description: Missing required 'iat' field in auth context

invalid-type.json.description: Wrong type for 'iat' field (string instead of number)

empty-evidence.json.description: Empty evidence block (valid - no payment or attestation)
